rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A minimalist, Vastu-compliant entrance hall that channels positive energy. Doors are aligned with the east to invite prosperity.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Serves as a multifunctional space for family gatherings and entertainment. Windows on the south-eastern wall ensure natural light and air flow per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Compact yet fully functional kitchen with modern appliances and minimalistic cabinetry, placed in the northeast corner to promote health and wealth as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom located in the south-western zone. The room features ample natural light with a large window on the east for positive energy.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A functional bathroom placed near the kitchen, ensuring ease of maintenance and alignment with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Dedicated library space located on the north-western side for quiet study. The positioning is chosen to enhance mental clarity and focus.

openings.description: The main entrance is placed in a Vastu-compliant position, ensuring positive energy flow.
Large window on the south-eastern wall for natural light and ventilation.
Balcony door adjacent to the bedroom providing a view of the garden and additional ventilation.

garden.description: A large garden area that spans part of the plot. Planted with native flora and designed as per Vastu guidelines for sustainability and natural harmony.
